dcterms:creator: Y. LeCun
L. Bottou
Y. Bengio
P. Haffner
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset consists of handwritten digits, commonly used for training various image processing systems. It contains 60,000 training samples and 10,000 test samples, each representing a single digit from 0 to 9.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: A. Krizhevsky
G. Hinton
dcterms:description: The CIFAR-10 dataset consists of 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 different classes, with 6,000 images per class. It is widely used for training machine learning models in image classification tasks.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10
